name: Willem Scholten Consultancy
membership:
Koninklijke Nederlandse Maatschappij ter Bevordering van de Pharmacie (KNMP)
International Association for Hospice and Palliative Care (IAHPC)
goal: Consultant - Medicines and Controlled Substances, i.e. independent consultant in the area of improving access to controlled medicines and (psychoactive) substance control policies.
euInitiatives:
Policies of the EU Hortizontal Drugs Group with regards to EU position taken in the UN Commission on Narcotic Drugs en WHO, in particular the ECDD; Commenting on drug control policies by publishing and presenting at conferences, e.g. the EU focused annual SIP conference;
Researching and promoting access to controlled medicines globally; Expert Member of a guidelines group of the CoE Pompidou Group developing guidelines on access to pharmacological treatment of opioid dependence.
